speaker: Clinician
text: You mentioned you've been having some chest discomfort with exertion. Just to be cautious, I’m going to add low-dose aspirin to your regimen.
label: prescribes low-dose aspirin

speaker: Patient
text: Okay, I’ll pick it up today. Just the baby aspirin, right?
label: medication clarification

speaker: Clinician
text: Yes, 81mg daily should do. Keep taking your warfarin as usual.
label: dosage and continuation advice
